title: Śrīla Jagannāth Dās Bābājī Mahārāj
author: by Śrīla Bhakti Rakṣak Śrīdhar Dev-Goswāmī Mahārāj

translation: “The great venerable Grandsire of pure devotion,<br class="SongVerse__break" />loved by all Vaiṣṇavas of both Nabadwīp and Vṛndāvan —<br class="SongVerse__break" />I worship the feet of that great Vaiṣṇava Guru,<br class="SongVerse__break" />the ocean of love, Śrīla Jagannāth Prabhu.”
